description: The Asus V470VA All-in-One PC has a premium and sleek design language. The AiO packs a 27-inch Full HD IPS display with a 100Hz refresh rate. The device is powered by the 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, which is more than sufficient to handle most daily tasks. Check out the review to learn more about the latest Asus AiO.
title: Asus V470VA All-in-One PC Review: A Stylish All-in-One PC For Everyday Work

description: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Pro targets professionals and is a great everyday laptop at under Rs. 1,50,000. It ticks all the right boxes when it comes to your daily machine and can do so much more. The display is excellent, and touch support is an add-on. The keyboard, speaker setup, and webcam also work fine. The Book 5 Pro isn't for gaming, and we don't see even Samsung marketing it—another MacBook Air rival you can buy from the house of Samsung.
title: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Pro Review: Your Work Companion

description: Gas workers in Peru discovered a 1,000-year-old mummy during pipeline work in Lima. The boy’s remains, found in a seated burial position with ceremonial items, belong to the Pre-Inca Chancay culture. The site is one of over 2,200 archaeological finds made by Calidda since 2004.
title: 1,000-Year-Old Mummy Found by Gas Workers in Peru Linked to Chancay Culture

description: A newly modelled 21-centimetre radio signal from hydrogen atoms just 100 million years after the Big Bang may reveal the mass of the universe’s first stars. Using REACH and the upcoming SKA telescopes, researchers aim to uncover how early starlight shaped cosmic evolution during the Cosmic Dawn, when the universe transitioned from darkness to light.
title: Radio Signal from Early Universe May Reveal the Masses of the First Stars

description: Excavations at Israel’s Tel Dan sanctuary have revealed that Phoenicians practised ritual cleansing for centuries. A bathing unit linked to priestly rites and later pilgrim use offers insight into evolving spiritual customs. New research expands our understanding of sacred traditions in the Near East, including the use of water in local religious ceremonies.
title: Ancient Tel Dan Temple Reveals Centuries-Old Phoenician Ritual Bathing Traditions

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has revealed that planets can form in extreme radiation zones. A protoplanetary disk called XUE 1, exposed to intense ultraviolet light, still shows signs of water and potential for rocky planet formation. The findings challenge old assumptions and broaden the possible regions where Earth-like planets may emerge.
title: James Webb Telescope Spots Planet Formation in Harshest Known Galactic Environments

description: A powerful X1.9-class solar flare from sunspot 4114 erupted on June 19, disrupting shortwave radio signals across the Pacific, including Hawaii. While it caused significant atmospheric ionisation, no coronal mass ejection (CME) followed. The event highlights rising solar activity and hints at more eruptions ahead, potentially impacting communications and space weather conditions.
title: Massive X-Class Solar Flare Erupts, Causing Widespread Pacific Radio Blackouts

description: Azadi, a Malayalam thriller featuring a hospital jailbreak plot, is set for digital release. Its Tamil version is expected soon on Sun NXT. Starring Sreenath Bhasi and Raveena Ravi, the film weaves suspense, emotional drama, and high-stakes action into one gripping story.
title: Azadi OTT Release Revealed Online: Where to Watch it Online?

description: First Copy is a Munawar Faruqui starrer web series that follows a young man during the 1990s, who builds an illegal empire of piracy in Mumbai. However, things take a drastic turn when he comes into the eye of a dedicated police officer. Will he be able to save himself? Watch on Amazon MX Player.
title: First Copy Now Streaming on Amazon MX Player: Everything You Need to Know About Munawar Faruqui Starrer Drama Series

description: Written, directed, hosted, and produced by Vir Das himself, Fool Volume is the new Netflix Original that will land on July 18th, 2025. The show will revolve around Vir Das, emphasizing the importance of owning your voice and how powerful the sound that your mind creates
title: Vir Das: Fool Volume OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch

description: Embark on the journey of an independent woman who, circumstantially, enters into the business of weed. Ghaati is a rural crime drama that guarantees to keep the audience hooked with its action, mystery, and twists throughout. In Theatres from July 11th, 2025.
title: Ghaati OTT Release Date: When and WHere to Watch Telugu Crime Drama Online?

description: Gahtikachalam, a Nikhil Devadulla starrer, is a Telugu horror movie that revolves around a teenage medical student who gets possessed by a spirit.
title: Ghatikachalam Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know About Telugu Psychological Horror Drama
